y:** `sub_code`| | |reasonOfDelay|**Operational Delay:** `schedops.LEG_DELAY`| |**Operational Delay:** `reason`| | |actualDuration|**Operational Delay:** `schedops.LEG_DELAY`| |**Operational Delay:** `dtime`| | |estimatedDuration|**Operational Delay:** `schedops.LEG_DELAY`| |**Operational Delay:** `dtime`| | |updatedArrivalTime|**Operational Delay:** `SCHEDOPS.LEG`
|**Scheduled Delay:** `flightdelayisk`|**Operational Delay:** `ARR_DT`

**Scheduled Delay:** `scheduledLandingTime`, `arrivalAirport`| **Operational Delay:** `xcrew_lt.GETLOCALTIME`(when `ARR_AP_SCHED` <> `ARR_AP_ACTUAL` then `ARR_AP_ACTUAL` else `ARR_AP_SCHED`, `ARR_DT`)
**Scheduled Delay:** `xcrew_lt.GETLOCALTIME`(`arrivalAirport`, `scheduledLandingTime`)
**Note:** `xcrew_lt.GETLOCALTIME` is a function within the Netline database. | |updatedDepartureTimeLocal|**Operational Delay:** `SCHEDOPS.LEG`|**Scheduled Delay:** `flightdelayisk`|**Operational Delay:** `DEP_AP_ACTUAL`, `DEP_AP_SCHED`, `DEP_DT`
**Scheduled Delay:** `scheduledTakeOffTime`, `departureAirport`|**Operational Delay:** `xcrew_lt.GETLOCALTIME`(when `DEP_AP_SCHED` <> `DEP_AP_ACTUAL` then `DEP_AP_ACTUAL` else `DEP_AP_SCHED`, `DEP_DT`)
**Scheduled Delay:** `xcrew_lt.GETLOCALTIME`(`departureAirport`, `scheduledTakeOffTime`)
**Note:** `xcrew_lt.GETLOCALTIME` is a function within the Netline database.| |lastUpdate| | | | N/A in the source system. | |status|**Operational Delay:** `schedops.LEG_DELAY`| |**Operational Delay:** `STATE`|**Operational Delay:** when `schedops.LEG_DELAY.STATE` = “NEW“ then “ACTIVE“ else “CANCELLED“
